name: FruitDeepLinks - Peacock v2.0 (FireTV and AndroidTV)
author: bnhf
description: Peacock for FruitDeepLinks. Compatible with FireTV and AndroidTV devices.
tune_commands: am start -n $(dumpsys package '||TARGET_PACKAGE_NAME||' 2>/dev/null | awk '/sportscenter:/{getline; print $2; exit}') -d '||TARGET_URL_OR_IDENTIFIER||'
